summary: The Internet Archive, founded in 1996 by Brewster Kahle, is a free online library with millions of digital books, videos, software, music, and web pages. It aims to provide "universal access to all knowledge." Since 2009, its headquarters has been in a former church in San Francisco. The Archive collects most of its data automatically using web crawlers, preserving websites and other digital content. People can also upload their own digital materials. As of 2024, it has over 866 billion web pages and more than 42 million books.
title: Internet Archive
